# smallCaps(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adjusts the font to enable/disable all small capitals.

## Declaration

```swift
func smallCaps(_ isActive: Bool) -> Font
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Font/lowercaseSmallCaps()] and [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Font/uppercaseSmallCaps()] for more details.
